definitions.definition: To kill or otherwise permanently eliminate all of (a population of pests or undesirables ), usually intentionally .
examples: We'll use poison to exterminate the rats.

definitions.definition: To bring a definite end to; to finish completely .
examples: The public school failed to exterminate truancy.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To kill or otherwise permanently eliminate all of (a population of pests or undesirables ), usually intentionally .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , transitive ) To bring a definite end to; to finish completely .
